update resume
real_name = #{real_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
intended_position = #{intended_position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

self_evaluation = #{self_evaluation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
